ygData.subject: Re: OOC: Two years ago....
ygData.msgSnippet: I doubt you offended me, but you probably offended Kyle. Correcting someone isn t mean. I agree that it wasn t necessary, but that doesn t make it mean,

someone isn't mean. I agree that it wasn't necessary, but that 
doesn't make it mean, peasant. =p
